tcl.vivado_vhdl_tcl:
# AMD-Xilinx Vivado project start and tcl script: Create project, xc7z020clg400-1 technology, VHDL model
# To execute,
# open cmd window
# cd to project folder
# start Vivado (with tcl file parameter)
# e.g, for project name $proj_name
# cmd
# cd $proj_dir
# $vivado_bat_path -source $tcl_path
# Vivado tcl file $proj_name.tcl, created in AMDprj folder
cd $proj_dir
# Close_project Not required. Will advise that Vivado sessions should be closed.
start_gui
create_project $proj_name ./VHDL/AMDprj -part xc7z020clg400-1 -force
set_property target_language VHDL [current_project]
add_files -norecurse ./VHDL/model/$comp_name.vhd $arrayPackage $files
update_compile_order -fileset sources_1
set_property SOURCE_SET sources_1 [get_filesets sim_1]
add_files -fileset sim_1 -norecurse ./VHDL/testbench/$tb_name.vhd
update_compile_order -fileset sim_1
